decks.notes: This UW Control deck focuses on countering and removing threats from the opponent while also drawing cards and gaining card advantage. It includes a mix of counterspells, board wipes, and card draw spells to control the game tempo. The deck also includes a small creature package to provide additional threats and battlefield presence. The land base is designed to ensure consistent mana fixing and access to all required colors. Ultimately, the goal of this deck is to outvalue the opponent by efficiently controlling the board and disrupting their game plan.

This deck focuses on quickly filling up the graveyard with creatures to take advantage of powerful reanimation spells like Awaken the Honored Dead. Once the graveyard is stocked, the combo pieces come into play to bring back threatening creatures such as Ardyn, the Usurper and Overlord of the Balemurk. The deck also utilizes cards like Bitter Triumph and Bringer of the Last Gift to further fuel the reanimation process. By setting up the graveyard efficiently and playing the right cards at the right time, this deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a powerful army of revived creatures.

The deck focuses on overwhelming your opponent with a fast and aggressive playstyle, utilizing a combination of efficient creatures, removal spells, and disruption. By utilizing cards like Llanowar Elves and Sentinel of the Nameless City to ramp up your mana and play powerful threats like Demon Wall and Lord Skitter, Sewer King early on, you can put pressure on your opponent and control the board. With a mix of removal spells like Maelstrom Pulse and Tragic Trajectory, as well as hand disruption with Duress, you can disrupt your opponent's game plan and secure victory through relentless aggression.

This UR Aggro deck focuses on quickly overwhelming opponents with efficient creatures and burn spells. By utilizing cheap and versatile cards like Torch the Tower, Stormchaser's Talent, and Thundertrap Trainer, the deck aims to apply pressure early and maintain tempo throughout the game. Roaring Furnace and Steaming Sauna provide additional removal options, while cards like Opt and Quantum Riddler help filter through the deck to find key pieces. With a mix of direct damage, card draw, and aggressive threats, this deck aims to win the game swiftly before opponents can stabilize.

The archetype of this Izzet Control deck revolves around utilizing a combination of card draw, removal spells, and burn spells to control the board and outvalue the opponent. By combining efficient removal like Abandon Attachments and Combustion Technique with powerful card draw engines like Accumulate Wisdom and Artist's Talent, this deck aims to establish board presence and tempo advantage while chipping away at the opponent's life total. The inclusion of cards like Gran-Gran and Agna Qel'a provide additional utility and flexibility in dealing with threats, making it a versatile and potent control deck.

This Orzhov Aggro deck focuses on quickly overwhelming opponents with a combination of aggressive creatures and removal spells to control the board. With cards like Deep-Cavern Bat and Demon Wall providing threats, while cards like Seam Rip and Unholy Annex/Ritual Chamber deal with opponent's creatures, this deck aims to control the game through tempo and pressure. By utilizing powerful cards like Elspeth, Storm Slayer and Aang's Iceberg, along with a mix of creatures and removal spells, this deck aims to establish early dominance and prevent opponents from stabilizing.

This deck focuses on quickly overwhelming your opponent with aggressive creatures and burn spells. By efficiently using low-cost creatures and direct damage spells, you aim to deal damage to your opponent as quickly as possible to win the game. The deck includes powerful creatures like Nova Hellkite and Emberheart Challenger, along with burn spells like Lightning Strike and Burst Lightning to finish off your opponent. The goal is to constantly apply pressure and force your opponent to react, allowing you to take control of the game and secure a victory.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly fill up the graveyard with powerful creatures and then bring them back into play using reanimation spells. The combination of combo pieces like Superior Spider-Man, Oblivious Bookworm, and Overlord of the Balemurk, along with reanimation spells like Awaken the Honored Dead and Analyze the Pollen, allows for explosive plays and overwhelming board presence. Utilizing cards like Harvester of Misery and Bitter Triumph provide additional value and control options, while the mana base and support cards ensure consistency and protection for the combo strategy.

The focus of this deck is to control the game using a combination of instant and sorcery spells, as well as removal and card draw effects. The deck aims to maintain board presence and disrupt the opponent's strategy by bouncing their permanents back to their hand, countering their spells, and overwhelming them with powerful spells. By constantly drawing cards, generating mana, and utilizing versatile spells, the deck aims to outvalue and outlast the opponent until it can secure a victory through incremental advantages and strategic plays.

The main focus of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of low-cost aggressive creatures and disruptive spells. Using cards like Floodpits Drowner and Spyglass Siren to apply constant pressure, while also utilizing cards like Phantom Interference and Multiversal Passage to disrupt the opponent's strategy. The deck also includes a mix of removal spells like Stab and Heartless Act to deal with threats. The inclusion of cards like Kaito, Bane of Nightmares and Cecil, Dark Knight provide additional options for closing out the game quickly.

The deck focuses on using various cards to quickly fill the graveyard with creatures and then reanimate them onto the battlefield for a powerful combo. Cards like Bringer of the Last Gift, Awaken the Honored Dead, and Overlord of the Balemurk help facilitate this strategy. Additionally, cards like Bitter Triumph and Ardyn, the Usurper provide ways to manipulate the graveyard and control the game. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a flood of powerful creatures while disrupting their game plan with control elements.

The main concept of this UW Control deck is to slow down the opponent's pace by controlling the board with cards like Authority of the Consuls and Perilous Snare, while simultaneously building up resources and gaining card advantage with cards like Meticulous Archive and Multiversal Passage. The deck also includes cards like Cryogen Relic and Clay-Fired Bricks to protect against aggressive strategies and stall until the late game where the player can establish dominance with powerful finishers like Pinnacle Starcage and United Battlefront. The deck focuses on resource management and strategic decision-making to outlast and outmaneuver opponents.

The main idea of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent quickly with aggressive creatures and burn spells. By efficiently utilizing cheap spells and creatures, the deck aims to put pressure on the opponent and close out the game before they can stabilize. Cards like Torch the Tower and Stormchaser's Talent provide direct damage, while creatures like Tiger-Seal and Drake Hatcher maintain a constant presence on the battlefield. The deck also benefits from versatile spells like Opt and Abrade to keep the aggression going and disrupt the opponent's strategy.

This Mono Black Aggro deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with a combination of aggressive creatures like Gatekeeper of Malakir and Iridescent Vinelasher, supported by efficient removal spells like Shoot the Sheriff and Bloodletter of Aclazotz. The deck also includes cards like Forsaken Miner and Realm of Koh to disrupt the opponent's strategy while maintaining a strong board presence. With a mix of low-cost creatures and powerful finishers like Unstoppable Slasher, this deck aims to apply constant pressure and secure a swift victory.

The key concept of this deck is to quickly deploy aggressive creatures and spells to apply pressure on the opponent, utilizing a mix of blue and red cards for versatility and power. By combining efficient creature threats with disruptive spells, the deck aims to control the board and deal damage quickly before the opponent can stabilize. Card draw and selection tools help maintain a steady stream of threats, while powerful finishers provide the ability to close out games. The deck's strategy revolves around proactive plays and tempo advantage to overwhelm the opponent and secure victory.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly build up a board presence of aggressive creatures while disrupting the opponent's game plan with counterspells and removal. The deck aims to apply pressure early on with efficient creatures like Floodpits Drowner and Spyglass Siren, supported by cards like Tragic Trajectory and Bitter Triumph to deal with threats. The inclusion of cards like Lazav, Wearer of Faces and Kaito, Bane of Nightmares provides additional versatility and power to the deck's strategy, allowing for multiple avenues to victory.
